DOC.brief_summary: In conventional laparoscopic cholecystectomy, the cystic duct and artery are clipped by metal clips. we propose a new method in which the cystic duct is ligated and the cystic artery is cauterized. the investigators compare both methods.
DOC.criteria: Laparoscopic cholecystectomy for symptomatic gallstones Conversion to laparotomy
